[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@here/harp-text-canvas](./harp-text-canvas.md) &gt; [AdditionParameters](./harp-text-canvas.additionparameters.md)

## AdditionParameters interface

Optional parameters passed on \[\[TextCanvas\]\].`addText` function call.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface AdditionParameters 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [layer](./harp-text-canvas.additionparameters.layer.md) | number | Layer where text will be added. |
|  [letterCaseArray](./harp-text-canvas.additionparameters.lettercasearray.md) | boolean\[\] | Array containing info on whether the glyphs are upper or lower case. Needed to support <code>SmallCaps</code>. |
|  [path](./harp-text-canvas.additionparameters.path.md) | THREE.Path \| THREE.CurvePath&lt;THREE.Vector2&gt; | Path where text should be placed on. Overrides the original position parameter. |
|  [pathOverflow](./harp-text-canvas.additionparameters.pathoverflow.md) | boolean | If <code>true</code>, text on a path will be placed even when its size its bigger than the path's size. |
|  [pickingData](./harp-text-canvas.additionparameters.pickingdata.md) | any | Object containing additional data intended to be retrieved during picking. |
|  [updatePosition](./harp-text-canvas.additionparameters.updateposition.md) | boolean | If <code>true</code>, the input position parameter will be updated to contain the position of the last glyph added. |
